metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20204 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap memory corruption problem (use after free) can be triggered in libgetdata v0.10.0 when processing maliciously crafted dirfile databases. This degrades the confidentiality, integrity and availability of third-party software that uses libgetdata as a library. This vulnerability may lead to arbitrary code execution or privilege escalation depending on input/skills of attacker.

notes.Note: leosilva> deferred as no fix as 2021-10-18

criterions.comment: libgetdata package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
